title: Shoplifting: Sharon's Story
creator_credit: Dennis Cull, Yvonne Chotzen and Auro Productions
brief_description: Tells the story of a young woman who steals from a department store and is subsequently arrested. Shows her reactions and as those of her parents, to the humiliation of search, interrogation, detention, family, confrontation and court procedure.
